characters

Class MainCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • characters.MainCharacter

  • public class MainCharacter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the character that the player has access to.

    This character is a playable character, as opposed to all the other unplayable characters. The class combines a set of Sprites with an ItemSet, ItemInventory, GemInventory, and SpellInventory.

    Changes: The class now supports all interactions between the MainCharacter, all three inventories, and graphics.

    Total Time Spent: 2.5 hour(s).

    Version:
    2.0.0.0
    Author:
    Lev Raizman
